title: Ask an Australian about driving [Serbo Croat version]
creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
brief_description: Shows various driving conditions that may be encountered in Australia. The demands of both city and country driving are dealt with. Different traffic regulations in each state are explained, with emphasis on the need to obey traffic signs and laws. Shows how to set about buying a car. Note: In Serbo-Croatian.
